text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Hnnmnnm～

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Hooyah!!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: It's me!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Lover of sports!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Always sparkling!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Here to sweat it out with you all!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Your favorite athlete Umatuber!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: The one and only Sonon Elfie!!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text:
It's finally happening!! The event 
that will crown the number one 
athlete horsegirl…

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: The H.A.F!!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text:
Or to give its full name, 
the Horsegirl Athletic Fest!!

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text: Oooooh! I'm so excited!! Aren't you, Ms. Ryoka?!

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
…I am the Event Manager for the H.A.F, 
Tsurugi Ryoka. It's a pleasure to see 
the big day arrive indeed.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text: Welcome to this new form of entertainment.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
In the H.A.F, horsegirls will be pushing 
their physical abilities to the limit.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
They will be vying for the top spot, with fire 
in their hearts, and their pride on the line.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
Get ready for an event like no other. 
The ultimate mixed sports competition.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
It will be a display of horsegirls' hidden 
talents, and the start of new legends.

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text:
Today, you will have a front row 
seat to this all-new experience.

text_block_list.name: Sonon Elfie
text_block_list.text:
Expect passionate athletic horsegirls 
glistening in sweat! Watch the union 
of spirit and muscle! Don't miss out!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurugi Ryoka
text_block_list.text: Without further ado then…

text_block_list.name: Ryoka & Elfie
text_block_list.text: H.A.F. Ready… GO!!

H.A.F. Ready GO! 
～Sparkling Athletes～
